name: Quranic Stories Manifest
description: Comprehensive manifest of 35+ Quranic stories with verse mappings, Arabic content, and cross-surah connections

stories.summary_en: The creation of Adam, the test in Paradise, the descent to Earth, and the path to repentance.

segments.summary_en: Allah announces to the angels the creation of a khalifa on Earth
Adam is taught the names of all things
Angels prostrate to Adam, but Iblis refuses
Adam and wife in Paradise with one prohibition
Adam receives words of repentance and is forgiven
Detailed account of Iblis's reasoning (Al-A'raf)
The covenant with Adam (Surah Taha)
Iblis's arrogance and vow to mislead (Surah Sad)

connections.explanation_en: Surah Al-A'raf provides more detail about Iblis's dialogue

stories.summary_ar: قصة خلق آدم عليه السلام، واختباره في الجنة، ونزوله إلى الأرض، وطريقه إلى التوبة. تتناول القصة رفض إبليس السجود لآدم وعداوته الأبدية للبشر.

stories.summary_en: Prophet Nuh's 950 years of calling his people to monotheism, the building of the Ark, and the Great Flood.

segments.summary_en: Nuh's methods of calling his people day and night
Building the Ark and the mockery of his people
The flood and loading the Ark
Nuh's son refuses to board and drowns
The Ark settles on Mount Judi
Nuh calls upon his Lord after rejection

connections.explanation_en: After years of rejection, Allah commands building the Ark

stories.summary_ar: قصة نوح عليه السلام ودعوته لقومه تسعمائة وخمسين عاماً، وبناء السفينة، والطوفان العظيم الذي أهلك المكذبين ونجا منه المؤمنون.

stories.summary_en: The father of prophets - his journey from idol-worshipping society to becoming Khalilullah (Friend of Allah).

segments.summary_en: Ibrahim's logical journey from stars to the Creator
Ibrahim's gentle call to his father Azar
Breaking the idols and being thrown into fire
Allah commands the fire to be cool and safe
Angels bring news of Ishaq and the destruction of Lut's people
The ultimate test - willingness to sacrifice his son
Ibrahim and Ismail raise the foundations of the Ka'bah
Ibrahim is commanded to call people to Hajj

connections.explanation_en: After the sacrifice test, Ibrahim settles Ismail near the Ka'bah

stories.summary_ar: قصة أبي الأنبياء إبراهيم عليه السلام، رحلته من عبادة الأصنام إلى التوحيد، ومحاولة قومه إحراقه، وابتلاؤه بذبح ابنه، وبناء الكعبة المشرفة.

stories.summary_en: The most mentioned prophet in the Quran - from birth to liberation of Bani Israel.

segments.summary_en: Musa's mother places him in the river; found by Firawn's family
Youth, the accidental killing, and flight to Madyan
The sacred valley and receiving the mission
Confrontation with Firawn and the nine signs
Magicians recognize truth and accept faith
Parting of the sea and drowning of Firawn
Receiving the Tablets at Mount Sinai
The golden calf incident
Musa's journey with Al-Khidr

connections.explanation_en: After crossing, Bani Israel travel to Sinai

stories.summary_ar: قصة موسى عليه السلام الأكثر ذكراً في القرآن، من ولادته ونجاته من فرعون، إلى بعثته وتحريره لبني إسرائيل، ومعجزاته العظيمة.

stories.summary_en: 'The best of stories' - from the childhood dream to family reunion in Egypt.

segments.summary_en: Yusuf's dream of eleven stars
Brothers throw Yusuf in the well
Sold to the Aziz of Egypt
The temptation and Yusuf's steadfastness
Prison and interpreting dreams
Interprets king's dream, becomes minister
Brothers come to Egypt
Yusuf reveals himself, forgives brothers
Family reunited, dream fulfilled

stories.summary_ar: أحسن القصص - رحلة يوسف عليه السلام من رؤيا الطفولة إلى لقاء العائلة في مصر، عبر الجب والعبودية والسجن حتى أصبح عزيز مصر.

stories.summary_en: The miraculous birth, mission, miracles, and ascension of Prophet Isa.

segments.summary_en: Angel announces Isa to Maryam (Al-Imran)
Detailed birth narrative (Surah Maryam)
Baby Isa speaks from the cradle
Allah reminds Isa of his miracles
Disciples request table from heaven
Clarification that Isa was not crucified
Isa affirms he only taught monotheism

connections.explanation_en: Two detailed accounts of Isa's miraculous birth

stories.summary_ar: قصة عيسى عليه السلام، الولادة المعجزة، ورسالته إلى بني إسرائيل، ومعجزاته بإذن الله، ورفعه إلى السماء.

stories.summary_en: The only woman named in the Quran - her devotion, the miraculous birth, and her faith.

segments.summary_en: Maryam's mother dedicates her to Allah's service
Zakariyya's care and the miraculous provision
Angels announce Maryam is chosen above all women
Angel Jibreel appears to announce Isa
Maryam gives birth alone under a palm tree
Maryam returns with baby; Isa speaks

stories.summary_ar: قصة مريم العذراء عليها السلام، المرأة الوحيدة المسماة في القرآن، عبادتها وتكريمها وولادتها لعيسى.

stories.name_en: Story of Prophets Zakariyya and Yahya
stories.summary_en: The elderly Zakariyya is granted a son, Yahya, after years of prayer.

segments.summary_en: Zakariyya's secret prayer for an heir
Allah answers with the name Yahya
Yahya's qualities and blessings
Zakariyya prays after seeing Maryam's provision

connections.explanation_en: Two accounts of Zakariyya's prayer for a child

stories.summary_ar: قصة زكريا ويحيى عليهما السلام، دعاء زكريا للولد في الكبر، واستجابة الله له بيحيى الذي لم يجعل له سمياً.

stories.summary_en: The prophet-king who commanded jinn, wind, and understood animals.

segments.summary_en: Sulayman's kingdom over jinn, men, and birds
The ant warning its colony about Sulayman's army
The hoopoe brings news of Queen of Sheba
The Queen of Sheba visits and accepts Islam
Sulayman's death and the jinn's ignorance of unseen
The test of the throne

stories.summary_ar: قصة سليمان عليه السلام الذي سخر له الله الجن والريح والطير، ولقاؤه مع ملكة سبأ، وحكمته وملكه العظيم.

stories.summary_en: The shepherd who defeated Goliath and became a prophet-king with the Zabur.

segments.summary_en: Dawud kills Jalut in battle
Allah gives Dawud kingship and wisdom
Mountains and birds praise with Dawud
Iron made soft for Dawud
Two disputants test Dawud's judgment

stories.summary_ar: قصة داوود عليه السلام، الراعي الذي قتل جالوت وأصبح نبياً ملكاً، آتاه الله الزبور وعلمه صنعة الدروع.

stories.summary_en: The prophet of patience who lost everything but never lost faith.

segments.summary_en: Ayyub calls to his Lord in affliction
Allah heals Ayyub and restores his family
Ayyub praised for his patience

stories.summary_ar: قصة أيوب عليه السلام نبي الصبر، ابتلاء طويل بالمرض وفقدان الأهل والمال، ثم الشفاء والعافية بعد الدعاء.

stories.summary_en: The prophet who was swallowed by a whale and whose people uniquely repented.

segments.summary_en: Yunus leaves his people and boards a ship
Whale swallows Yunus; he glorifies Allah
Yunus's famous prayer in the darkness
Yunus is rescued and recovers
His people uniquely repent and are saved

stories.summary_ar: قصة يونس عليه السلام الذي التقمه الحوت ودعا ربه في الظلمات، وقومه الذين آمنوا فكشف عنهم العذاب.

stories.summary_en: Prophet Lut's struggle against the immoral people of Sodom.

segments.summary_en: Lut warns his people about their immorality
Angels visit Lut; he fears for them
Cities destroyed at dawn; stones of baked clay
Lut's wife stays behind and perishes

stories.summary_ar: قصة لوط عليه السلام ونهيه لقومه عن الفاحشة، وهلاك المكذبين بالحجارة من سجيل منضود.

stories.summary_en: The prophet who called for honesty in trade and weights.

segments.summary_en: Shu'ayb calls to worship Allah and fair dealing
Shu'ayb warns of previous nations' fate
People reject; destroyed by the Shade
Earthquake destroys the rejecters

stories.summary_ar: قصة شعيب عليه السلام نبي أهل مدين، دعوته إلى التوحيد وإيفاء المكيال والميزان، وهلاك قومه بالصيحة.

stories.summary_en: Prophet Salih and the miraculous she-camel given as a sign to Thamud.

segments.summary_en: Salih calls Thamud to worship Allah
The she-camel as a sign - don't harm her
They hamstring the camel despite warning
A single blast destroys Thamud

stories.summary_ar: قصة صالح عليه السلام وقومه ثمود، والناقة المعجزة التي عقروها فأخذتهم الصيحة.

stories.summary_en: Prophet Hud's call to the powerful people of 'Ad who were destroyed by wind.

segments.summary_en: Hud calls 'Ad to worship Allah alone
'Ad reject Hud; boast of their strength
Furious wind destroys them for seven nights
Hud and believers saved from punishment

stories.summary_ar: قصة هود عليه السلام وقومه عاد الذين كانوا أشداء أقوياء، فأهلكهم الله بريح صرصر عاتية.

stories.name_en: Story of the People of the Cave
stories.summary_en: Young believers who fled persecution and slept for centuries.

segments.summary_en: Introduction to their miraculous story
Young men who believed in their Lord
Their miraculous sleep in the cave
They awaken after centuries
Guidance about not speculating on their number

stories.summary_ar: قصة فتية الكهف الذين آمنوا بربهم فزادهم هدى، وناموا في الكهف ثلاثمائة سنين وازدادوا تسعاً.

stories.summary_en: The righteous king who traveled east and west and built a barrier against Yajuj and Majuj.

segments.summary_en: Allah established him on earth
Journey to the setting of the sun
Journey to the rising of the sun
Building the barrier against Yajuj and Majuj
Acknowledges the barrier is from Allah's mercy

stories.summary_ar: قصة ذي القرنين الملك الصالح الذي مكنه الله في الأرض، ورحلاته شرقاً وغرباً، وبناؤه السد على يأجوج ومأجوج.

stories.summary_en: Luqman's wise counsel to his son on faith, prayer, and character.

segments.summary_en: Luqman given wisdom and gratitude
Warning son against associating partners with Allah
Kindness to parents but not in disobeying Allah
Even a mustard seed's weight is accounted for
Prayer, patience, humility in walking and speaking

stories.summary_ar: قصة لقمان الحكيم ووصاياه لابنه في التوحيد والصلاة والصبر والتواضع.

stories.summary_en: The wealthy man from Bani Israel who was arrogant about his wealth and swallowed by the earth.

segments.summary_en: Qarun's immense wealth - keys needed carriers
His people advise him to seek the Hereafter
Qarun claims wealth came from his knowledge
Qarun displays wealth; people wish for the same
Earth swallows Qarun and his dwelling

stories.summary_ar: قصة قارون من قوم موسى الذي آتاه الله الكنوز العظيمة فبغى وتكبر، فخسف الله به وبداره الأرض.

stories.name_en: Story of the Two Sons of Adam
stories.summary_en: The first murder in human history - Cain killing Abel out of jealousy.

segments.summary_en: Two sons offer sacrifices; one accepted, one rejected
Qabil threatens to kill Habil
Habil's noble response - will not raise hand
Qabil kills Habil and becomes remorseful
A crow teaches Qabil how to bury his brother

stories.summary_ar: قصة ابني آدم هابيل وقابيل، أول جريمة قتل في تاريخ البشرية بدافع الحسد.

stories.name_en: Story of the People of the Elephant
stories.summary_en: Abraha's army with elephants destroyed while attempting to demolish the Ka'bah.

segments.summary_en: Allah destroys the army with birds of Ababil carrying stones

stories.summary_ar: قصة أصحاب الفيل الذين أرادوا هدم الكعبة فأرسل الله عليهم طيراً أبابيل ترميهم بحجارة من سجيل.

stories.summary_en: Bani Israel commanded to slaughter a cow to reveal a murderer, but keep questioning specifications.

segments.summary_en: Musa commands them to slaughter a cow
They keep asking for specifications
They finally slaughter but almost did not
Dead man struck with part of cow; reveals murderer

stories.summary_ar: قصة البقرة التي أمر الله بني إسرائيل بذبحها لمعرفة القاتل، وكثرة أسئلتهم وتعنتهم.

stories.summary_en: The man who passed by a ruined village, died for 100 years, then was resurrected.

segments.summary_en: Passes by ruins, wonders how Allah will resurrect
Dies 100 years, thinks it was a day
Food fresh, donkey bones reassemble - a sign

stories.summary_ar: قصة الذي مر على قرية خاوية فأماته الله مئة عام ثم بعثه ليريه قدرته على الإحياء.

stories.summary_en: A village that tried to trick Allah by fishing on Sabbath through nets, transformed into apes.

segments.summary_en: Fish came on Sabbath, not on other days
They transgressed by setting traps
Those who warned, those who stayed silent, those who transgressed
Transgressors transformed into despised apes

stories.summary_ar: قصة أصحاب السبت الذين احتالوا على أمر الله فمسخهم قردة خاسئين.
أمر الله الملائكة بالسجود لآدم فسجدوا جميعاً إلا إبليس أبى واستكبر وكان من الكافرين. تبين القصة طاعة الملائكة المطلقة ورفض إبليس.
stories.summary_en: Allah commanded the angels to prostrate to Adam. They all prostrated except Iblis who refused out of arrogance.

segments.summary_en: Allah commands angels to prostrate
Angels prostrate, Iblis refuses

segments.summary_ar: حوار إبليس مع الله وسبب رفضه
segments.summary_en: Iblis's reasoning for refusing

stories.summary_ar: قصة نفر من الجن استمعوا للقرآن فآمنوا به وولوا إلى قومهم منذرين. تؤكد القصة أن رسالة القرآن للإنس والجن.
stories.summary_en: A group of jinn listened to the Quran and believed, then returned to warn their people.

segments.summary_en: Jinn listen to the Quran
Jinn believe and warn their people

stories.summary_ar: قصة يأجوج ومأجوج القوم المفسدين الذين بنى ذو القرنين السد لحجزهم، وسيخرجون في آخر الزمان.
stories.summary_en: The story of Gog and Magog, the corrupting people whom Dhul-Qarnayn blocked with a barrier.

segments.summary_en: Building the barrier against them
Their emergence at the end of times

stories.summary_ar: مثل رجل أعطاه الله جنتين فتكبر ونسي شكر الله، فأهلك الله جنتيه. مثل للمتكبرين بالنعم.
stories.summary_en: A parable of a man given two gardens who became arrogant, forgetting Allah's blessings, so his gardens were destroyed.

segments.summary_en: Description of the two gardens
The owner's arrogance
The believer's advice
Gardens destroyed, owner regrets

stories.summary_ar: مثل الكلمة الطيبة كشجرة طيبة أصلها ثابت وفرعها في السماء تؤتي أكلها كل حين. مثل للإيمان والتوحيد.
stories.summary_en: The parable of a good word like a good tree with firm roots and branches reaching the sky.

segments.summary_en: Parable of good and bad word

stories.summary_ar: مثل يضربه الله لبيان ضعف الأصنام: لن يستطيعوا خلق ذبابة ولو اجتمعوا، وإن يسلبهم الذباب شيئاً لا يستنقذوه منه.
stories.summary_en: A parable showing the weakness of idols - they cannot create even a fly.

segments.summary_en: The fly parable and idols' weakness

stories.summary_ar: مثل الذين اتخذوا من دون الله أولياء كمثل العنكبوت اتخذت بيتاً، وإن أوهن البيوت لبيت العنكبوت.
stories.summary_en: Those who take protectors besides Allah are like the spider - whose house is the frailest.

segments.summary_en: The spider parable

stories.summary_ar: ذكر قوم تبع في سياق الأمم المهلكة، يُذكرون مع عاد وثمود وفرعون كعبرة للمكذبين.
stories.summary_en: The people of Tubba mentioned among destroyed nations as a warning to those who reject truth.

segments.summary_en: Tubba mentioned with destroyed nations
Mentioned in Surah Qaf

stories.summary_ar: أصحاب الرس من الأمم المهلكة، يُذكرون في سياق التحذير من التكذيب.
stories.summary_en: The people of Ar-Rass, mentioned among destroyed nations as a warning.

segments.summary_en: Mention of the people of Ar-Rass
Listed with destroyed nations

stories.summary_ar: أصحاب الأيكة هم قوم شعيب الآخرون، كذبوا الرسل فأخذهم عذاب يوم الظلة.
stories.summary_en: The people of the Thicket, another community to whom Shu'ayb was sent, destroyed by the torment of the Day of Shadow.

segments.summary_en: Rejection of Shu'ayb by Al-Ayka
Punishment of the Day of Shadow

stories.summary_ar: قصة طالوت الملك الذي اختاره الله لبني إسرائيل، واختباره لجنوده بالنهر، وقتل داوود لجالوت.
stories.summary_en: The story of Talut chosen as king, his army's test at the river, and Dawud killing Goliath.

segments.summary_en: Talut chosen as king
Testing soldiers at the river
Dawud kills Goliath

stories.summary_ar: حادثة الإفك عندما اتهم المنافقون أم المؤمنين عائشة رضي الله عنها، فبرأها الله من فوق سبع سماوات.
stories.summary_en: The incident of slander against Aisha, and Allah's revelation clearing her innocence.

segments.summary_en: The accusation and revealed verses
Clearing of Aisha's innocence

connection_types.description: One passage expands on details of another
Two passages tell the same event from different angles
One passage continues the narrative from another
Passages share a common theme across stories

explanation.en: The story of Adam's sons directly follows his descent to Earth
explanation.ar: قصة ابني آدم تتبع مباشرة نزوله إلى الأرض

explanation.en: Ibrahim's descendants include both Ismail (Arab prophets) and Ishaq (Israelite prophets including Musa)
explanation.ar: من ذرية إبراهيم إسماعيل (أنبياء العرب) وإسحاق (أنبياء بني إسرائيل ومنهم موسى)

explanation.en: The cow incident occurred during Musa's time with Bani Israel
explanation.ar: حادثة البقرة وقعت في زمن موسى مع بني إسرائيل

explanation.en: Sabbath breakers were descendants of those who followed Musa
explanation.ar: أصحاب السبت من ذرية بني إسرائيل الذين اتبعوا موسى

explanation.en: Qarun was from the people of Musa and rebelled with his wealth
explanation.ar: قارون كان من قوم موسى وطغى بماله

explanation.en: Both nations were destroyed for rejecting their prophets - Nuh's by flood, 'Ad by wind
explanation.ar: كلا القومين أُهلكا لرفضهم أنبياءهم - قوم نوح بالطوفان وعاد بالريح

explanation.en: Thamud succeeded 'Ad and were similarly destroyed for disobedience
explanation.ar: ثمود خلفوا عادًا وأُهلكوا مثلهم بسبب العصيان

explanation.en: Both Thamud and Lut's people destroyed for ignoring clear warnings
explanation.ar: كلا ثمود وقوم لوط أُهلكوا لتجاهل الإنذارات الواضحة

explanation.en: Angels visited Ibrahim then went to Lut; Shu'ayb's people also destroyed
explanation.ar: الملائكة زارت إبراهيم ثم ذهبت إلى لوط؛ وقوم شعيب أُهلكوا أيضًا

explanation.en: Both prophets exemplify patience through extreme trials - Yusuf in prison, Ayyub in illness
explanation.ar: كلا النبيين يجسدان الصبر في الابتلاءات الشديدة - يوسف في السجن وأيوب في المرض

explanation.en: Both called upon Allah in distress and were answered
explanation.ar: كلاهما دعا الله في الضيق وأُجيبت دعوته

explanation.en: Sulayman inherited prophethood and kingdom from his father Dawud
explanation.ar: سليمان ورث النبوة والملك من أبيه داوود

explanation.en: Zakariyya cared for Maryam and both families received miraculous children
explanation.ar: زكريا كفل مريم وكلا العائلتين رُزقت بأطفال معجزين

explanation.en: Maryam's story leads directly to Isa's miraculous birth
explanation.ar: قصة مريم تؤدي مباشرة إلى الولادة المعجزة لعيسى

explanation.en: Both stories appear in Surah Al-Kahf teaching about time and power
explanation.ar: كلتا القصتين وردتا في سورة الكهف تعلمان عن الزمن والقوة

explanation.en: Both emphasize monotheism in advising their children
explanation.ar: كلاهما يؤكدان التوحيد في نصيحة أبنائهما

explanation.en: Ibrahim built the Ka'bah; Allah protected it from Abraha's army
explanation.ar: إبراهيم بنى الكعبة؛ الله حماها من جيش أبرهة

explanation.en: Both stories demonstrate Allah's power over life and death
explanation.ar: كلتا القصتين تُظهران قدرة الله على الإحياء والإماتة

explanation.en: Both were saved from destruction of their disbelieving communities
explanation.ar: كلاهما نجا من هلاك مجتمعاتهما الكافرة

explanation.en: Isa descended from Ibrahim through Ishaq; Muhammad through Ismail
explanation.ar: عيسى من ذرية إبراهيم عبر إسحاق؛ ومحمد عبر إسماعيل
